TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract RibbonOfficeMenu implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 提供对添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单的控件的访问。

span.span: Provides access to controls that you add to the Microsoft Office Menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您将添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 项到项目中，Visual Studio 会自动分配一个新对象传递给所生成的属性接口。When you add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to your project, Visual Studio automatically assigns a new object to the property of the generated interface. 此对象用于将新控件添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单在运行时，或添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单的访问控制。Use this object to add new controls to the Microsoft Office Menu at run time, or to access controls that you added to the Microsoft Office Menu. 在运行时，但只能在功能区加载之前，您可以添加控件。You can add controls at run time, but only before the Ribbon is loaded. 创建控件的实例，然后添加到新的控件集合。Create an instance of the control, and then add the new control to the collection. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例循环访问功能区 Office 菜单上的自定义控件，并显示其名称。The following example iterates through the custom controls on the Ribbon Office menu and displays their name. 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 到 Office 项目的项。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project. 2. 将按钮添加到 Microsoft Office 按钮。Add a button to the Microsoft Office Button. 3. 设置 **（名称）** 到按钮的属性`myOfficeMenuButton`。Set the **(Name)** property of the button to `myOfficeMenuButton`. 4. 设置**PositionType**属性设置为**AfterOfficeID**下**位置**属性。Set the **PositionType** property to **AfterOfficeID** under the **Position** property. 5. 设置**OfficeID**属性设置为**FilePrintMenu**下**位置**属性。Set the **OfficeID** property to **FilePrintMenu** under the **Position** property. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#15](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/CS/Ribbon1.cs#15)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#15](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/VB/Ribbon1.vb#15)]

summary.span: 获取添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单的功能区控件。

span.span: Gets the Ribbon controls that you added to the Microsoft Office Menu.

value.span: 在设计时或运行时添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单的功能区控件集合。

span.span: The collection of Ribbon controls that you added to the Microsoft Office Menu at design time or run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在运行时，但只能在功能区加载之前，您可以添加控件。You can add controls at run time, but only before the Ribbon is loaded. 创建控件的实例，然后添加到新的控件集合。Create an instance of the control, and then add the new control to the collection. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 使用功能区设计器将控件添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单在 Visual Studio 会自动添加到控件属性。When you add controls to the Microsoft Office Menu by using the Ribbon Designer, Visual Studio automatically adds the controls to the property.

exception.span: 加载功能区后，尝试添加、移除或替换 。

span.span: You try to add, remove, or replace a after the Ribbon is loaded.
